amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the appropriation in the bill by 0.5 percent across-the-board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriation in the bill by 0.5 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 267 (Roll no. 520).
